text: President Trump sided with protesters -- some of whom were armed -- in Michigan for their effort to reopen parts of the state after Gov. Gretchen Whitmer extended her emergency declaration keeping some businesses shuttered amid the coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/yXw7k4krYf
